faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.description: Common questions about the Sanskrit course.

questions.question: Is this course suitable for complete beginners?
questions.answer: Yes, this course is designed for complete beginners and will take you from zero to intermediate level.

questions.question: How long does it take to complete?
questions.answer: The course is self-paced and typically takes 3-4 months with regular study of 2-3 hours per week.

questions.question: Will I be able to read Sanskrit texts after this course?
questions.answer: Yes, by the end of the course you will be able to read and understand simple to intermediate Sanskrit texts.
